name: Italian Grilled Eggplant Caprese
author: Bren
summary: A variation on insalata Caprese with the addition of grilled eggplant--a great appetizer or vegetarian side for a summer barbecue.
ingredients: 2 small purple eggplants, cut into 1/2-inch slices
1 (8 ounce) package fresh mozzarella, thinly sliced
3 leaves fresh basil, cut into thin strips
directions: Combine olive oil, garlic, and salt in a small bowl; set aside
Preheat an outdoor grill to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) and lightly oil the grate
Put eggplant slices on the hot grill and cook for 3 to 4 minutes
Turn eggplant and brush with the oil mixture
Place 1 slice of tomato and 1 slice of mozzarella cheese on each eggplant piece
Close the lid and cook until cheese has melted, 3 to 4 minutes
Transfer to a plate and sprinkle with basil
